name: postcss-global-import-once
description: PostCSS plugin to set import statements once globally.

1.0.0.name: postcss-global-import-once
1.0.0.description: PostCSS plugin to set import statements once globally.

2.0.0.name: postcss-global-import-once
2.0.0.description: PostCSS plugin to set import statements once globally.

scripts.test: npm run lint && nyc mocha --require esm 'test/**/*.js' $([[ $WATCH_TEST ]] && echo --watch) && nyc check-coverage
scripts.version: version-changelog CHANGELOG.md && changelog-verify CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
